ingredients.item: ½ x 500g pack essential Waitrose Gnocchi
125g pack Waitrose Tenderstem Broccoli Tips, halved
150g pack Waitrose Kiln Roasted Scottish Salmon Slices, torn into chunks

instructions.step: Cook the gnocchi, broccoli and asparagus tips in boiling water for 4 minutes until just tender, then drain.
Whisk the lemon zest and juice with the oil and mustard, and toss into the gnocchi with the salmon chunks.
Season and serve with extra dressing drizzled over.
